name: untitled dungeon game (Mitch Schiwal)
description:
you ever make a joke about a project and go "haha unless..."

this is that. i said let's just put dnd into a forged in the dark system.

originally this was a parody to be released for april fool's day.

but i am the fool because i have put real effort into this game and it's kept growing into something beyond a dumb joke.

and i am gonna let it keep growing. what we have right now is a minimum viable playtest. with this and the forged in the dark srd you should be able to try it out.

it's not finished. but it is fun.

- Any feedback can be sent to here
